book.synopsis: Laura and her family and friends share a series of adventures, from racing ponies with Cousin Lena to bobsled rides with Cap Garland and the gang . . . and even mean old Nellie Oleson cannot spoil their fun! Simultaneous.
book.title_long: Little House Friends (Little House Chapter Book)
